channel.title: || Zaros || A brand New Adventure! ||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://www.zarosps.com/public/style_images/4_Untitled-1.png[/img]
[url=http://zarosps.com]- Home -[/url]
[B][SIZE=1]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[I]Working Summoning & Hunter, to go alongside the other usual skills. Making maxing that little bit harder. All 4 PvP Armours properly added. Fully working trident of the seas. Toxic Blowpipe. Over 9 Bosses! 5 Mini-games to keep you entertained. 6 very nice skilling areas, with teleports to all of them allowing easy access. Working Boss Pets. New Barrow Mini-game allowing you to see which brothers you have killed on the screen! Slayer Monster Guide, which will teleport you to a destination you choose to battle against monsters from slayer tasks. Spirit Shields, Sigils & Holy Elixer. Allowing the creation of spirit shields. Boss & Slayer Logs allowing you to keep track of your kills of almost any monster in the server. Unique Slayer Store making slayer worth while even if you are level 99.[/I]
[spoiler] [B]A view of the shopping area, nice & neat![/B] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1z3m55k.png[/img]
[B]Why Slayer is worth while![/B] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/14tpp9u.png[/img]
[B]Did someone say boss pets?[/B] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/34ngqra.png[/img]
[B]Some of the items that may catch your eye:[/B] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/fvbdyt.png[/img]
[B]Nothing special but global announcements & new skill tab:[/B] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2uggkd3.png[/img]
[B]Mini-Games available on the server:[/B] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2hoy4oy.png[/img]
[B]Caption says it all:[/B] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/i53dkx.png[/img]
[B]Slayer Log:[/B] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2uqgi3a.png[/img]
[B]Boss Log:[/B] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/149vwpd.png[/img]
[B]New Mithril Dragon Lair:[/B] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/sqmds6.png[/img]
[B]Unique Summoning Pouch Interface:[/B] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2w4wldz.png[/img]
[B]Individual Skilling Area 6 Alltogether:[/B] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2zqzndl.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Thanks for taking the time to read my advertisment, hopefully see all you guys in game where you can fully explore the server!
Mikey.

item.title: || Zaros || A brand New Adventure! ||
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Looks like a decent server man!
Might stop by to play for a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: || Zaros || A brand New Adventure! ||
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

- Home -

[B][SIZE=1]Features:[/SIZE][/B]

[I]Working Summoning & Hunter, to go alongside the other usual skills. Making maxing that little bit harder.
All 4 PvP Armours properly added.
Fully working trident of the seas.
Toxic Blowpipe.
Over 9 Bosses!
5 Mini-games to keep you entertained.
6 very nice skilling areas, with teleports to all of them allowing easy access.
Working Boss Pets.
New Barrow Mini-game allowing you to see which brothers you have killed on the screen!
Slayer Monster Guide, which will teleport you to a destination you choose to battle against monsters from slayer tasks.
Spirit Shields, Sigils & Holy Elixer. Allowing the creation of spirit shields.
Boss & Slayer Logs allowing you to keep track of your kills of almost any monster in the server.
Unique Slayer Store making slayer worth while even if you are level 99.[/I]
